author: RTÉ News
title: Shutting down shops a 'difficult decision' - Harris
description: The Minister for Health has said the new restrictions announced today to curb the spread of Covid-19 will put hundreds of thousands of people out of their jobs.
content:
The Minister for Health has said the new restrictions announced today to curb the spread of Covid-19 will put hundreds of thousands of people out of their jobs.
Simon Harris said the Government had to take what he described as "the very difficult decision" o… [+3406 chars]
